forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 8C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 48F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers overnight. Low 4C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain this evening. Showers continuing overnight. Low 41F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers and thundershowers in the morning, then cloudy with rain likely in the afternoon. High 9C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers and thundershowers in the morning, then overcast during the afternoon with occasional rain. High 49F. Winds SW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Thundershowers following a period of rain early. Low near 5C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Thundershowers following a period of rain early. Low 43F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Thunderstorms likely. High 8C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Thunderstorms likely. High 47F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 4C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low around 40F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 7C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 46F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with mostly cloudy conditions late. Low around 0C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with overcast skies late. Low 33F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High near 5C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 43F. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear. Low -2C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 29F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny skies during the morning hours will give way to cloudy skies with a mixture of light rain and snow developing in the afternoon. High 4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny skies during the morning hours will give way to cloudy skies with a mixture of light rain and snow developing in the afternoon. High around 40F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional snow showers. Low -1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 7-12cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers in the evening will give way to a mixture of rain and snow late at night. Low 31F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of precip 60%. Snow accumulating 3 to 5 inches.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mixture of rain and snow showers. High 4C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: A mixture of rain and snow showers. High around 40F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 30%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow in the evening will transition to snow showers overnight. Low -2C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow in the evening transitioning to snow showers late. Low near 30F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow in the morning will become intermittent in the afternoon. High 3C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow showers. High 39F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional snow showers. Low -4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. Snowfall of 2-3cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers. Low 26F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. About one inch of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers before noon. Becoming partly cloudy later. High 1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers early. Peeks of sunshine later. High 36F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear to partly cloudy. Low -4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 27F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Plentiful sunshine. High 2C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Generally sunny. High 36F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening with more clouds for later at night. Low -2C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Low near 30F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.
